name: jasmin-realtime
postCreateCommand: apk add --update git; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install -U autopep8; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade build; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade twine; echo "alias build='rm -rf dist/*; python3 -m build'; alias push='python3 -m twine upload -u __token__ -p \$PYPI_TOKEN dist/*'; export PYPI_TOKEN=pypi-AgEIcHlwaS5vcmcCJGFhMzY3ODFmLTliNjAtNGRlMC04OGNlLWEyNTgwMjczZDNmOQACFVsxLFsiamFzbWluLXRlbG5ldCJdXQACLFsyLFsiOTY4YzNhZTYtNGQ1YS00OWFiLTgxNmUtODAyNTNlOTQzMjRhIl1dAAAGIAUlCcSaXu18g9Yi9inY18PsZ9Oj6WiiGkb31BLSLCKe" > ~/.bashrc
